title: whimsical ball-filled pool takes center stage at between the walls’ clothing store in kyiv
description: a light blue palette fills the 200-square-meter space by between the walls, characterized by its white walls and tiled flooring. The post whimsical ball-filled pool takes center stage at between the walls’ clothing store in kyiv appeared first on designboom | architecture & design magazine.
author: kateryna koval
excerpt: between the walls completes the flagship showroom of the clothing brand one by one in kyiv, offering a bold retail concept.
text: Between the Walls enhances retail with playful features in KyivUkrainian design studio Between the Walls completes the flagship showroom of the clothing brand One by One in Kyiv, offering a bold retail concept infused with playful, interactive features. A light blue palette fills the 200-square-meter space, characterized by its white walls and tiled flooring. A whimsical circular pool filled with balls, sleek fitting rooms, and cozy seating areas that double as photo zones encourage the customers to capture moments of the store for their social media accounts. The showroom reflects the brand’s values of self-expression and individuality, designed to provide an immersive shopping experience.‘This project was a personal reception of the opposing emotions I’ve been feeling due to the ongoing war in Ukraine.’ explains Victoria Karieva, lead designer at Between the Walls.‘Through the concept of the interactive pool and playful design elements, we wanted to offer an escape—a place where people could experience joy, ease, and a sense of distraction, even if just for a short while.’all images by Dmytro Dychek and Pavlo Lutov, courtesy of Between the WallsOne by One showroom adDresses the emotional needs of visitorsKyiv-based studio Between the Walls invites visitors to feel transported away from the bustling city for a moment, introducing the central feature of the showroom, an interactive ball pit. Apart from the playful elements, the design puts user experience first with fitting rooms clad with white tiles and equipped with metallic stools and mirrors. Ambient lighting ensures a comfortable atmosphere, while the seating area doubles as a social media-friendly photo opportunity, extending the showroom’s reach online. The interior reflects the youthful energy of One by One while addressing the emotional needs of its visitors during challenging times.Between the Walls completes the flagship showroom of the clothing brand One by One in Kyivthe bold retail concept is infused with playful, interactive featuresa light blue palette fills the 200-square-meter spacemirrors reflect the white tiled walls and flooringsleek fitting rooms encourage customers to capture moments for their social media accountsthe showroom reflects the brand’s values of self-expression
html:
Between the Walls enhances retail with playful features in Kyiv

Ukrainian design studio Between the Walls completes the flagship showroom of the clothing brand One by One in Kyiv, offering a bold retail concept infused with playful, interactive features. A light blue palette fills the 200-square-meter space, characterized by its white walls and tiled flooring. A whimsical circular pool filled with balls, sleek fitting rooms, and cozy seating areas that double as photo zones encourage the customers to capture moments of the store for their social media accounts. The showroom reflects the brand’s values of self-expression and individuality, designed to provide an immersive shopping experience.

‘This project was a personal reception of the opposing emotions I’ve been feeling due to the ongoing war in Ukraine.’ explains Victoria Karieva, lead designer at Between the Walls.‘Through the concept of the interactive pool and playful design elements, we wanted to offer an escape—a place where people could experience joy, ease, and a sense of distraction, even if just for a short while.’


all images by Dmytro Dychek and Pavlo Lutov, courtesy of Between the Walls

One by One showroom adDresses the emotional needs of visitors

Kyiv-based studio Between the Walls invites visitors to feel transported away from the bustling city for a moment, introducing the central feature of the showroom, an interactive ball pit. Apart from the playful elements, the design puts user experience first with fitting rooms clad with white tiles and equipped with metallic stools and mirrors. Ambient lighting ensures a comfortable atmosphere, while the seating area doubles as a social media-friendly photo opportunity, extending the showroom’s reach online. The interior reflects the youthful energy of One by One while addressing the emotional needs of its visitors during challenging times.


Between the Walls completes the flagship showroom of the clothing brand One by One in Kyiv


the bold retail concept is infused with playful, interactive features

mirrors reflect the white tiled walls and flooring
